title: Raw Chocolate Fudge Snowballs
directions: Combine dates, walnuts, cacao powder, vanilla extract, and coconut oil in a food processor. Pulse until well combined.
Squeeze and roll mixture into balls. Roll balls in shredded coconut to cover all sides. Refrigerate to set. Enjoy!
(You could also wrap them in cellophane with ribbon and give to family and friends as a yummy Christmas gift.)
